title: Create new account not working
body: Ok so my friend and I are having problems signing up we put all the information down to create an account then we click "play for free", and then we are stuck at "loading...." Forever. anyone got any solutions?

replies.body: If you're on the website and it's taking forever to load, you might try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if it loads a bit faster, or possibly try using a different browser. If it keeps happening after awhile of trying, hit me back up and I can see what I might be able to do.
yep it is still loading .  kinda stuck help me xD !
